name: Extron, a Global Supply Chain company
tag_list: supply, chain, solutions, management, scm, logistics, operations, optimize, manage, outsource, enterprise, business, consultancy, inventory, systems
overview: Extron, headquartered at Fremont, CA, has been delivering world-class supply chain solutions to its diverse client base for more than 25 years. The company provides total value chain solutions, from orders to fulfillment. Extronâ€™s supply chain solutions have been specially engineered to improve flexibility and reduce risk for its clients. With on-demand product configuration in close proximity to the distribution channels, Extron is able to reduce manufacturing costs, lead-time and inventory overhead. For more information on Extron and its service offerings, please visit www.extroninc.com.
